item.title: Superjail! %% help on where to add this into client.java?!
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

yo can u help me with this pl0x?

okay so im making it where you cant tele in any means if your in jail, and ive got this so far,

public boolean inJail() { if((absX >= 3012 && absX <= 3017 && absY >= 3193 && absY <= 3197) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

to declare if your in jail or not

and this to make it so you cant teleport if you logout and back in if your “inJail”.

if (inJail); teleblock == true; }

first off, how would that be done right?
second, where would i add that? ive alredy got the boolean injail added correctly.
all help greatly appriciated.

Read full topic
